segment.source: Creating a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: Creating a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: Creating a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: Creating a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: Creating a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: Creating a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: A MED-V workspace is the desktop environment in which end users interact with the virtual machine provided by MED-V.
segment.target: A MED-V workspace is the desktop environment in which end users interact with the virtual machine provided by MED-V.

segment.source: The MED-V workspace is created and customized by the administrator.
segment.target: The MED-V workspace is created and customized by the administrator.

segment.source: It consists of an image and the policy, which defines the rules and functionality of the MED-V workspace.
segment.target: It consists of an image and the policy, which defines the rules and functionality of the MED-V workspace.

segment.source: Multiple MED-V workspaces can be created, each customized with its own configuration, settings, and rules.
segment.target: Multiple MED-V workspaces can be created, each customized with its own configuration, settings, and rules.

segment.source: A user, group, or multiple users or groups can be associated with each MED-V workspace, thereby making the MED-V workspace available only for the associated user's or group's computers.
segment.target: A user, group, or multiple users or groups can be associated with each MED-V workspace, thereby making the MED-V workspace available only for the associated user's or group's computers.

segment.source: How to Add a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: How to Add a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: To add a MED-V workspace
segment.target: To add a MED-V workspace

segment.source: Click the Policy management button to open the Policy module.
segment.target: Click the Policy management button to open the Policy module.

segment.source: The Policy module consists of the Workspaces menu on the left and the General, Virtual Machine, Deployment, Applications, Web, VM Setup, Network, and Performance tabs.
segment.target: The Policy module consists of the Workspaces menu on the left and the General, Virtual Machine, Deployment, Applications, Web, VM Setup, Network, and Performance tabs.

segment.source: On the Policy menu, select New Workspace, or click Add to create a new MED-V workspace.
segment.target: On the Policy menu, select New Workspace, or click Add to create a new MED-V workspace.

segment.source: On the General tab, in the Name field, enter the name of the MED-V workspace.
segment.target: On the General tab, in the Name field, enter the name of the MED-V workspace.

segment.source: In the Description field, enter a description for the MED-V workspace.
segment.target: In the Description field, enter a description for the MED-V workspace.

segment.source: In the Support contact info field, enter the contact information for technical support.
segment.target: In the Support contact info field, enter the contact information for technical support.

segment.source: For more information about configuring a MED-V workspace, see Configuring MED-V Workspace Policies.
segment.target: For more information about configuring a MED-V workspace, see Configuring MED-V Workspace Policies.

segment.source: How to Clone a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: How to Clone a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: A MED-V workspace can be cloned so that you can create a MED-V workspace identical to an existing MED-V workspace.
segment.target: A MED-V workspace can be cloned so that you can create a MED-V workspace identical to an existing MED-V workspace.

segment.source: To clone a MED-V workspace
segment.target: To clone a MED-V workspace

segment.source: Click the MED-V workspace to clone.
segment.target: Click the MED-V workspace to clone.

segment.source: On the Policy menu, select Clone Workspace.
segment.target: On the Policy menu, select Clone Workspace.

segment.source: A new MED-V workspace is created with the name Original MED-V workspace name - 2.
segment.target: A new MED-V workspace is created with the name Original MED-V workspace name - 2.

segment.source: How to Delete a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: How to Delete a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: To delete a MED-V workspace
segment.target: To delete a MED-V workspace

segment.source: In the Policy module, while the workspace pane is in focus, click Remove.
segment.target: In the Policy module, while the workspace pane is in focus, click Remove.
